channel.title: Comments on: How Many Languages Do You Speak?

item.title: By: Natalie Wood
item.dc:creator: Natalie Wood
item.description: Thank you for sharing your experience. It's now up to us, to do our best to help those around us to have a different experience, one without the fear and insecurity!
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for sharing your experience.
It’s now up to us, to do our best to help those around us to have a different experience, one without the fear and insecurity!

item.title: By: Jean-Jacq
item.dc:creator: Jean-Jacq
item.description: Very true, I too have experienced the frustration of being unable to express myself in my second language, let alone others. I can imagine a huge feeling of insecurity that could arise.
item.content:encoded: Very true, I too have experienced the frustration of being unable to express myself in my second language, let alone others. I can imagine a huge feeling of insecurity that could arise.

item.title: By: Natalie Wood
item.dc:creator: Natalie Wood
item.description: Thank you. I just hope that others can find this as thought provoking.
item.content:encoded: Thank you. I just hope that others can find this as thought provoking.

item.title: By: Jonathan Shock
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Shock
item.description: Great post - indeed this is something that we should be aware of at all levels of mathematics teaching.
item.content:encoded: Great post – indeed this is something that we should be aware of at all levels of mathematics teaching.
